oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Town Meeting Show - Ralph Emery - 1954-11-18 - WSIX
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpt from radio program Town Meeting Show, featuring Ralph Emery (announcer), James F. Murray Jr. (performer), and another unidentified male announcer, broadcast on November 18, 1954 on radio station WSIX (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Test tones -- (02:58) [Unidentified] introduces the speakers -- (03:13) Ralph Emery talks about Lipscomb College history in Nashville, TN -- (04:10) Ralph Emery introduces James F. Murray Jr. -- (04:20) James Murray talks about Lipscomb College and breaks to a commercial -- (04:40) Town Meeting Show subscription advertisement (Ralph Emery) -- (05:45) Ralph Emery thanks Lipscomb College and WSIX, and talks about future Town Meeting broadcasts -- (07:02) James F. Murray Jr. talks about next weeks Town Meeting broadcast -- (07:16) Closing statements (Ralph Emery)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSIX (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Emery, Ralph; Murray, James F., Jr.;
